subject: DHL parcel stuck since 24 December â€“ investigation or refund requested
description_text:
Hello,
I am contacting you regarding my order shipped with DHL Paket.
Tracking number: CE326636821DE
Destination: Romania
Current status: Stuck in DHL export parcel center, Feucht, Germany since
24.12.2025, with no updates since then.
I contacted DHL Germany, and they confirmed that only the sender can open
an official investigation (Nachforschungsauftrag) for this shipment.
I kindly ask you to please:
Contact DHL Germany, and
Open an investigation to locate and forward the parcel as soon as possible.
If the shipment cannot be delivered within a reasonable time, I kindly
request information regarding a replacement shipment or a full refund.
Please let me know how you wish to proceed.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Kind regards,
Cristi Ichim
Romania
